title: League of Legends FPS Drop Issue: Any Suggestions On Fixing This?

embed.description: I've been having this issue for about a month now whenever I use the dance laugh and etc movements. Any suggestions on fixing this issue? PC Specs: Geforce GTX 1070 Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3930k CPU @ 3.20 GHZ 23.94 GB RAM

body: Not sure on what is going on but this has been happening for the past month or so. Any suggestions on fixing this issue?

replies.body:
Are you using G-Sync? If so, I'd recommend disabling the feature from inside your Nvidia Control Panel to see if anything changes.

Let me know what happens or if you aren't running G-Sync.
I'm not running G-sync or at least I don't think I'm running it. I don't have a G-sync section within the Nvidia Control Panel.

Gotcha. In that case, there are a number of factors that could be affecting your FPS to cause these spikes, so I recommend you work through our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to address the most common solutions.

I hope this resolves the issue for you!

I am having the same issue. I can confirm that G-Sync is enabled when this issue occurs. If I turn G-Sync off, my fps is stable. 
Currently using a gtx1060 pascal
